title: Besides the VPs that became President, what did all the former Vice Presidents go on to do? - Quora
tags: Presidents of the United States of America
History of the United States of America

response.answer_text: In most cases, not that much, but there are the notable ones: Burr — killed Alexander Hamilton in an infamous duel, tried for treason, but acquittedCalhoun — became Secretary of State and brought Texas into the UnionBreckinridge — Confederate general and Secretary of WarAdlai Stevenson I — grandfather of a future candidate for presidentWallace — Secretary of Commerce and presidential candidate for the Progressive PartyMondale — Ambassador to Japan, emergency candidate for the SenateGore — won an Oscar for the film An Inconvenient Truth

The most notable post Presidential career was held by William Howard Taft, who became an Associate Justice of the Supreme Court. In doing so, he became the only person thus far to serve in all three branches of the Federal Government. Recall that before his term as President he was a Senator from Ohio.
